channel.title: 🏢 School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanjing University of Science and Technology on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanjing University of Science and Technology on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Novel Object Synthesis via Adaptive Text-Image Harmony
item.description: Researchers created a novel object synthesis method, Adaptive Text-Image Harmony (ATIH), that harmoniously blends image and text inputs to generate creative, composite objects.
